titleInfo.title: Music City News Writers at Caffe Milano (1997)

mods.abstract: One color window card (brown on yellow) announcing Music City News Writers with Rebecca L. Howard, Kim Williams, Ron Harvin, Marty Dodson, Harley Allen, and special guests John and Audrey Wiggins at the Caffe Milano on October 16. Poster features a woodcut of cowboy and horse.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
